Uses of Package
com.sun.spot.security

Packages that use com.sun.spot.security
com.sun.spot.security Provides the classes and interfaces for the security framework.  
com.sun.spot.security.implementation This package contains the implementation specific classes, which are not part of the SATSA specificiation. 
com.sun.spot.security.spec Provides classes and interfaces for key specifications and algorithm parameter specifications.  
com.sun.spotx.crypto Provides the classes and interfaces for cryptographic operations.  
com.sun.spotx.crypto.implementation This package contains the implementation specific classes, which are not part of the SATSA specificiation. 
com.sun.spotx.crypto.spec Provides classes and interfaces for key specifications and algorithm parameter specifications.  
 

Classes in com.sun.spot.security used by com.sun.spot.security
DigestException
          This is the generic Message Digest exception.
GeneralSecurityException
          The GeneralSecurityException class is a generic security exception class that provides type safety for all the security-related exception classes that extend from it.
InvalidKeyException
          This is the exception for invalid Keys (invalid encoding, wrong length, uninitialized, etc).
Key
          The Key interface is the top-level interface for all keys.
MessageDigest
          This MessageDigest class provides applications the functionality of a message digest algorithm, such as MD5 or SHA.
NoSuchAlgorithmException
          This exception is thrown when a particular cryptographic algorithm is requested but is not available in the environment.
PrivateKey
          A private key.
PublicKey
          A public key.
Signature
          This Signature class is used to provide applications the functionality of a digital signature algorithm.
SignatureException
          This is the generic Signature exception.
